XXstuplaku:9: darśitaṃ lokanāthena stokaṃ stokaṃ kvacit kvacit |
XXstuplaku:11: sarvan tan setum iveha bhadravyūhena kathyate || 2 ||
XXstuplaku:13: na khabaddhaunnate snigdhe sthāne śucini kārayet || 3 ||
XXstuplaku:17: tad aṃśena tu nemy ādi yāvad yaṣṭiśiraṃ kramāt || 5 ||
XXstuplaku:18: caturasrā bhaven nemir adhastātaḥ tad ardhena |
XXstuplaku:21: udakodgamane yāvad ā śuddher cco bhuvaḥ smṛtāḥ || 7 ||
XXstuplaku:24: tad ūrdhvaṃ vedikāḥ kāryāḥ catustridv'eka saṃkhyayā |
XXstuplaku:26: sārccā gṛh'; ekasaṃyuktāṃ ūrdhvāṃ vediṃ prakalpayet |
XXstuplaku:29: tisras teṣāṃ tu kartavyā caturthaṃ biṃba ba || 11 ||
XXstuplaku:30: Here the text breaks off, as folio 2a,b is missing. From the commentary, I am quoting the fragmentary pieces of the stanzas which were included in the text portion of folio 2a,b.
XXstuplaku:34: adho vedyā vistāras tad vedikāyā hrasve kṛtam |
XXstuplaku:48: arhanta cakravartis tu pratyekaś ca jino jinaḥ || 26 ||
XXstuplaku:49: śaikṣāṇāṃ arhataś caiva gaṇakhaḍga jinasya ca |
XXstuplaku:54: adharā bhūmi pādāya yāvad ūrdhvaṃ krameṇa tu || 29 ||
XXstuplaku:56: 1. dānaṃ pṛthivī 2. śīlan nemi 3. catvāry āryavaṃśā aṅgaṇāṃ
XXstuplaku:66: 13. dvitīyatṛtīyadhyānabhūmijā prītiprīti saṃbodhyaṅgaṃ kaṇṭhakavalayaṃ valitakaṃ 14. anāgamyacaturthadhyānādibhūmijā
XXstuplaku:71: 17. kṣīṇāsravabalāni trīṇi cāvenikāni smṛtyupasthānāni trayodaśa cchatravalyāḥ
XXstuplaku:72: 18. uṣṇīṣo mahākaruṇāviśuddhiḥ (Bénisti: tad upari anuttaramahākaruṇāviśuddhyā uṣṇīṣaṃ
XXstuplaku:76: 21. āryaratnam idaṃ gāthādvayam satvaviṣayātmagataṃ ghaṇṭādvayaṃ 22. sarvākārajñātājñānaṃ cchatraṃ 23. alobhātmikacetovimukti dhvajaṃ ity api sa bhagavān ity ādi 24. yaśas patākāḥ prakīrṇakacaityalakṣanaṃ samāptam ||
XXstuplaku:82: stūpaṃ kṛtvopadeśena yen'; artho jagataḥ kṛtaḥ |
XXstuplaku:83: tam ahaṃ śirasā vande bhadravyūhāhvayaṃ yatiṃ || 2 ||
XXstuplaku:90: yasya vāco mano dehākhatulyāḥ sarvathā muneḥ || taṃ pranasyata sātatvaṃ vakṣye vinayakārikām iti || tad ekadeśa bhūtaṃ caidam ity anena nātrābhihitaṃ |
XXstuplaku:91: ata eva prakīrṇavinaya ity ādinā tayavatām asya sūcayati śāstrakāra ity ato na doṣaḥ |
XXstuplaku:92: Slkv §6 prakīrṇake hi yad viṃśatisahasrāyuṣiprajāyāṃ bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya
XXstuplaku:93: kṛkina rājñā stūpaḥ kṛtaḥ yojanam uccatvena yojanaṃ pariṇāhena ardhayojana pratisareṇa krośamātrikayā vedikayā |
XXstuplaku:95: sthale pradeśe stūpaṃ kartavyaṃ kārayatā prācīran ty evaṃ kartavyaṃ.
XXstuplaku:96: Slkv §7 athāṅgana (MS: athāṅgaṇa) vedī jaṃghā puṣpagrahaṇīyaṃ |
XXstuplaku:97: ā yakā aṇḍakaṃ kaṇṭhakaṃ kaṇṭhikā harmikā cchatrāvalī cchatraṃ ghaṇṭā dhvajaḥ patākā stūpagṛha āgama puṣkiriṇī prākāra coktaṃ |
XXstuplaku:99: cakravartibhūtena mayā yojanam uccaṃ yojanābhiveṣañ ca stūpaṃ kṛtam Slkv p. 215 iti |
XXstuplaku:100: tad anyeṣāṃ nikāyānām iti sarvāstivādināṃ stūpakalpanāsūtre kṣudrake coktaṃ |
XXstuplaku:101: Slkv §8 sagṛhastūpaḥ stambhaś catasraḥ pariṣaṇṇāḥ stambha sopāna lokapālā sthā sacandrasitāmbaraḥ patākā makaradhvajādayaḥ coktāḥ |
XXstuplaku:103: sarṣapaphalamātra dhātor arthāya āmalakamātraṃ stūpaṃ kārayet |
XXstuplaku:110: na khādi varjitonnate madhyonnate snigdhe arūkṣe śucini amedhyarahite ||
XXstuplaku:111: ity evaṃ stūpodgamapradeśaviśeṣaṃ nirdhāya lakṣaṇaṃ samupadarśayann āha |
XXstuplaku:118: Slkv §11 evam ihāpi pariṇāhaśabdena maṇḍalanābheś caturdiśaṃ |
XXstuplaku:120: caturthī pi kalaśādisthasaṃsthāneṣu tan mātraṃ pṛthutvasyāvyabhicārāt |
XXstuplaku:121: kiṃ saṃbandhinā pariṇāhena kumbhasya kumbhuḥ karaṇḍaka tasya pariṇāhena stūpa dairgheṇeṣṭam ity arthaḥ |
XXstuplaku:122: uktaṃ hi prakīrṇavinaye yojanam uccatvena yojanaṃ pariṇāheneti |
XXstuplaku:124: caturasrā catuṣkoṇabhūmyāṃ kumbhaḥ karaṇḍaḥ maṇḍalānurūpyena nemivistāro bhavatīty arthaḥ
XXstuplaku:126: eṣa kaścit stūpaṃ kārayatā prācīrāntāt tāvat kārayitavyeti tad anukramārthaṃ cātra caturasrake maṇḍalasūtrapātād bāhyābāhyato madhyakoṣṭhaparikṣepo 'bhyantarataś ca |
XXstuplaku:128: Slkv p. 216 tato 'bhyantare ca nemibhittivistārārdhena draṣṭavyam iti |
XXstuplaku:130: udakodbhedaṃ vā yāvad āśuddher vā bhuvaḥ pṛthivyāḥ smṛtam ity arthaḥ |
XXstuplaku:131: aṣṭabhāgonnatam ity ādi nemimānād aṣṭamāṃsam ādāya tenājitam unnataṃ kāryam ity arthaḥ |
XXstuplaku:134: vistāratas tv ayā vedikād bahiḥ kumbhapariṇāhapādenaiṣṭaṃ |
XXstuplaku:135: catur asrikā medhī vedī jaṃghāpuṭāvedī kartavyeti |
XXstuplaku:137: catasra pariṣaṇṇāḥ kartavyā iti catus tri dv'; eka saṃkhyāyety anenena vedikābhisaṃbandhaḥ kriyate |
XXstuplaku:143: tad āha ca catuṣkonāṣṭakoṇā vā athavā parimaṇḍaleti |
XXstuplaku:152: puṣpagrahaṇīśabdena na ca vedikābāhyata samantato vāpya paṃktyākāreṇa nānāsaṃsthānagṛhadvāramātre pūrvajātakapratimāṇāṃ racaneti ||
XXstuplaku:155: caturthako Slkv p. 217 bāhyakoṣṭhāṃśas tatra dhānyarāśikṛtaḥ |
XXstuplaku:162: tatrāpi bhāgavibhāgena dhānyarāśy ākṛteḥ || madhyakoṣṭhapramāṇena tisro vedyaḥ
XXstuplaku:166: adhaś caturthake bhāge kṛtānāṃ tisrāṇāṃ vedīnāṃ yāvantām apramāṇaṃ |
XXstuplaku:167: caturthī jaṃghāvedī catuṣkoṣṭhāpi kumbhasaṃsthāneṣv ity arthaḥ |
XXstuplaku:171: jaṃghāsaṃbandhinī vā puṭāvedī kumbhasya padmavalitam ity arthaḥ |
XXstuplaku:173: ṣaṇṇāṃ bāhyakoṣṭhānāṃ yo vistāras tad āyāmānāṃ tad dairghyām adhovedī kuryāt |
XXstuplaku:175: ṣaṭsaṃkhyaparicchinna-āyāmo yasyā vedyaḥ sābāhyakoṣṭha ṣaḍāyāmamātrām adhovedīṃ kalpayet |
XXstuplaku:176: yataḥ prakīrṇake yojanam uccasya krośamātrāvedīm ukteti |
XXstuplaku:180: athavā catasraḥ pariṣaṇṇāḥ kartavyā iti vacanāt || merupariṣaṇḍavat |
XXstuplaku:181: ardhardhonnati Slkv p. 218 kṣīṇañ ca kalpayet |
XXstuplaku:182: evaṃ tāvad bhūṅ gata stūpam ākhyāyādhunā bhūmimarjane stūpaṃ kṛtaṃ |
XXstuplaku:185: ato bhūmyā nimarjanena kāraṇāyāyan darśayann āha |
XXstuplaku:187: idan tu nimarjane nimarjanārthaṃ bhūmau stūpasya bhavatu unmānato kṣayo vedikānāṃ vistāras tu kim arthaṃ |
XXstuplaku:189: yata stūpāyāmatulyo hy adho vedyā vistāra iṣyate |
XXstuplaku:190: Slkv §18 yathā hy uktaṃ mahāvastuni cakravartibhūtena mayā stūpo kṛto yojanoccatvena yojanam abhiniveśeneti |
XXstuplaku:191: yatra hi yathā dhānyarāśyākṛteḥ kumbhasya yojanāni niveśya yojanābhiniveśo gamyate |
XXstuplaku:192: tathā vedikāyā api tu kumbhapariṇāha pramāṇena stūpa uccābhipretaḥ |
XXstuplaku:193: adhovedyā vistāras tad vedikāyā hrasve kṛtaṃ |
XXstuplaku:197: Slkv §19 unnāmena tathā kuryād ity ādi |
XXstuplaku:199: harmikām upādāya yo 'dhaś caturthabāhyakoṣṭhāṃśas tasya yo vibhāgaḥ prākkṛtas tenaiva vibhāgenaikona tisro vedyaḥ jaṃghāvedikādyā ity āvyāhāryaṃ |
XXstuplaku:200: na nirgacchet yathā biṃbam ity ādi |
XXstuplaku:203: karaṇḍaṃ yathā nādhaḥ pratiset tathordhvāṃ vedīm unnatāṃ kuryāt |
XXstuplaku:205: 'dhaḥ praviṣṭo nādhāya kalpate || karaṇḍakehy udgatety ādi |
XXstuplaku:206: prādhyānyena ūrdhvavartinyāś caturthyā jaṃghāvedyā hrāsonnāmakaraṇenaiva kumbhasyodgamam adhomarjanañ ca saṃpadyate |
XXstuplaku:208: Slkv §21 vedītrayasya connāmahrāso yataḥ tasmān nām'; adhoṃgaṇe ca kumbhe
XXstuplaku:214: karaṇḍaś ca tatas tūrikām iti jaṃghāpuṭāvedyā upari dhānyarāśy ādi saṃsthāne na kumbhaṃ vartulaṃ kuryāt || yataḥ prakīrṇe uktaṃ |
XXstuplaku:217: bāhyakoṣṭhadvayonmānavedyāsanād udgato vartulārdhapauṣṭiko dhānyarāśisaṃsthāno na tu tribhāgocchritaḥ
XXstuplaku:228: | abhiniveśamātraṃ apāsya yaḥ satvabhāvena īṣan samādhikabāhyakoṣṭhakordhvonmānāvedyāsanān samutthitaṃ |
XXstuplaku:230: Slkv §24 na kevalaṃ bodhisatvānāṃ pratimā kumbhena kāryā kāṃcaneti buddhapratimā api |
XXstuplaku:232: lakṣam iti pratimālaṃkārair hi stūpam alaṃkartum iti |
XXstuplaku:233: yatra hi pratimālaṃkārasyāpi pratiṣedhas tatra kathaṃ pratimāyā syāt |
XXstuplaku:235: Slkv §25 tad ūrdhvaṃ bāhyakoṣṭhasyety ādi bāhyakoṣṭhasya bhāgatyāgonnāmataś caturthārdhaparityāgaḥ parigrahaḥ śeṣapādatrayasya cch (?) id unnāmas Slkv p. 220 tasya ṣaṭ kṛtvā ardhāṃśaṃ kumbhāntaḥ praviṣṭam
XXstuplaku:237: Slkv §26 ekam āṃśakaṃ kaṇṭhikāvalitakāṃ harmikā yathākramaṃ |
XXstuplaku:239: bāhyakoṣṭhavistārā harmikā tasyādhaḥ svonmānena samantataḥ kaṇṭhakaṃ || kṣīṇāṃ kuryāt |
XXstuplaku:240: yathā śobhānurūpato vā anyathā kalpayed iti |
XXstuplaku:243: pañcaviṃśatikoṣṭhavibhāgena yaṣṭer mūlamadhyaśirasā parigrahaṃ sugamo harmikāyā ūrdhvaṃ catuṣṭha pi kumbhasaṃsthāneṣu bāhyakoṣṭhadvayonmāno 'dhas va yāvat |
XXstuplaku:246: yathā yaṣṭer āyāmakṣayāṃ vā pariṇāhakṣayo vāpy avagantavyam ity evaṃ yāvat |
XXstuplaku:253: yataḥ proktaṃ yathā syā śobhano bhavet |
XXstuplaku:257: yan mayoparjitaṃ puṇyaṃ tenāstu stūpas tu sugato jana iti ||
XXstuplaku:259: after this follows the Newārī note of a Nepalese librarian.
XXstuplaku:260: Slkv §29 śrī syaṃguyāyita siyā jetanaku 35 aṃgu liḍā 5 yavanhasa 7
XXstuplaku:261: saaṃkanaghāva || ghātasaku 9 ku 5 ghalasaku 3 umaḍe thaṃthu ucaku 18 aṃ 5
XXstuplaku:263: On the top drawsheet, there are the following lines:
XXstuplaku:264: 1x xxx xpralase tīsijya pu manasīyā tachosathu se kho thu teya
XXstuplaku:265: u(?)paritā na nesaṃ 2 ālayana || etad dharmax xx chelax xxx x|| tad anantara draṃma
